name: Dude
description:
Summary:

Just a dude chilling. Defeat the 4 bosses. I'd be really impressed if you managed to defeat more than 2. But for real though, this is my first java game and its pretty bad.

:(

So roast this game please.

Controls:

Arrow Keys --> Walk
Space Bar --> Interact/Open Doors
Z, X, C --> Melee, Shoot, Shield (respectively)
ESC --> Pause
